longBusinessSummary: Monarch Networth Capital Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides financial services to high net worth individuals, institutional and foreign investors, financial institutions, and corporate clients in India. It operates through three segments: Broking & other Finance Market Services; Non Banking Finance Business; and Insurance Business. The company offers equity and derivatives, commodities, and currency derivatives; alternative investment fund; mutual funds; bond and FD; and TradingView, an investing and trading platform offering heatmaps, market data, and a real time economic calendar to track key financial events. It also provides initial public offering; life and general insurance; depository services; merchant banking services comprising capital/fund raising and financial advisory services, including services for initial public offer/follow-on public offer/offer for sale/rights issue/takeover/ buyback on main board and SME platform of BSE/NSE; and private equity/venture capital funding/angel investing/QIBs, as well as equity raising through private placements; and national pension systems. The company was formerly known as Networth Stock Broking Limited and changed its name to Monarch Networth Capital Limited in December 2015. Monarch Networth Capital Limited was founded in 1992 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
